Class TradingCardInventorySystemView

java.lang.Object
TradingCardInventorySystemView
public class TradingCardInventorySystemView extends Object
The view component of the Trading Card Inventory System. Handles all user interface interactions, such as prompting inputs, displaying menus and collections, and confirming actions.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    TradingCardInventorySystemView()
    Constructs the view and initializes the scanner.

    • displayMainMenu

      public void displayMainMenu(boolean hasCards, boolean hasBinders, boolean hasDecks)
      Displays the main menu based on existing system state.
      Parameters:
      hasCards - whether the collection has cards
      hasBinders - whether any binders exist
      hasDecks - whether any decks exist
